name: The Outlaw, The Drunk, & The Whore- OST
detailed_description:
The Booger Myers Band strikes back with an all-original soundtrack to The Outlaw, The Drunk, & The Whore! Featuring real guitars, bass, drums, and the worst singing you ain't ever heard. Hey, for one guy it's not half bad!

Features all 15 songs from the game:

ODW Theme
El Story
Devil's Meeting
High Steppin'
Devil Time
The Token Swamp
Batty Cave
El Patti Moo Moo
Desert Bones
Warpath
Snow Time For Confederates
Ghost Town
Big River
Dead Duck
Ballad of Blondie



*All tracks written & performed by David Fillion (c) 2019

fullgame.name: The Outlaw, The Drunk, & The Whore

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win XP, 7, 10
  • Processor: Fully tested on 2Ghz, older machines should have no problem too
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: N/A, It's a soundtrack!
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything that makes me sound better, go for it

legal_notice: The Outlaw The Drunk & The Whore, (c) 2010-2019 David Fillion
